Emmanuel Castis (a mụrụ na 1 Febụwarị 1976), bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-agba egwu nke sitere na Gris. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri Isidingo, Erfsondes na Black Sails.
A mụrụ ya n'abalị1 Febụwarị afọ 1976 na Johannesburg, South Africa nye nne na nna ya bụ ndị Gris, Mike Castis na Maro Castis Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Witwatersrand
Ọ lụrụ onye ọlụlụ ya Sharlene Economou
Ha kwere nkwa ọlụlụ na Komati Gorge Lodge na Mpumalanga.
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 1997 na ihe nkiri ya na PJ Sabbagha na Forgotten Angle Dance Theatre Company ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Lennox' na egwuregwu Macbeth a ma ama
Mgbe ahụ, o tinyere aka na ihe nkiri egwu
Ka ọ dịgodị, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na telivishọn na-ewu ewu na telivishọn bụ Isidingo n'afọ 1999. N'ime usoro ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Steve Stethakis' nke ghọrọ onye ama ama
N'afọ 2004, o ritere ihe nrite nke ndị mmadụ maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri telivishọn
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na usoro Erfsondes dị ka onye isi nwoke
ma họpụta ya ugboro abụọ maka South African Film and Television Awards (SAFTA) maka Best Actor na usoro telivishọn
N'afọ 2008, o meriri n'asọmpi ama ama nke South African version of Dancing with the Stars
E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu nke ọma, ebe o dekọrọ abọm egwu mbụ ya n'afo 2008 na aha "South of Nowhere"
N'otu afọ ahụ, o meriri oge nke anọ nke ihe ngosi Strictly Come Dancing
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ̀ 2011, o wepụtara egwu "Stop Running" n'afọ 2011 na otu "Alive" na njedebe nke afọ 2015.
N'afọ 2014, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe maka SAFTAs
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri abụọ a ma ama na mba ụwa, Wild at Heart na Black Sails
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri: Cryptid, Eternity na Tremors 5: Bloodlines The, ọ gara gburugburu ụwa na Broadway hit musical Jersey Boys, dịka otu n'ime ndị ndu 'Nick Massi'
O mechara nweta otuto dị mma ma nweta nhọpụta maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na egwu na Naledi Theatre Awards.
